Removing MFA feature toggle as experimental.
Improving MFA flow.

Workflowy now supports multi factor authentication MFA to make your workflowy experience more secure. Note: If you update the Workflowy app immediately after it is released you may need to turn MFA on in the labs part of settings.
Implementing first version of MFA

On login less frequent recaptcha tests verifying you are human
File image uploads camera support Fix inability to log in. You may have to solve a re captcha now
You can now upload files and take photos with your camera. You can use to mirror and to link and they show up in the helper above the keyboard
This is a migration to a new foundation for our mobile app that should make it a lot easier to add native features. Please let us know if you have any issues! email help workflowy.com

Fixes a few visual glitches and bugs. Rolls out improved way of caching your data locally.
Improve speed of search Fix issue with new iOS offline data storage system

1 Bugfix: People should no longer sometimes see a frozen orange screen after switching back to workflowy when multi tasking. 2 Stability: iOS 12 and 13 have a storage bug in a system we rely on IndexedDb that can sometimes lead to minor data loss. We have built a new solution on top of a more stable part of iOS. There is an opt in button in settings which you can use to start using this new storage system.
Fixes a bug where swiping right to complete would break and you d be stuck with green bars on the page
Fixes for a few visual display bugs
New stuff! left bar for easier navigation and quickly adding to any list add and search for dates experimental feature turn on in settings search helper for dates and advanced searches

You can now make the text bigger or smaller using a slider. Open the ... menu in the lower right corner and choose Adjust Text Size . Swipe from right to left to delete an item Updated Icons Updated color scheme
Fix links to external apps Can now insert the cursor into tags while in edit mode When only one page is starred we will now take you directly there when clicking star in the bottom bar
The Starred and ... menus can now be swiped down to close them Sped up menu animations for a snappier feel

Fix a javascript error on the login page Update screenshots to reflect the current interface Make the bottom area gray to match menu bar on iPhone X instead of white Scroll text properly when you are in edit mode to keep it above the keyboard Fix search so it doesn t randomly clear after a few seconds

Welcome to WorkFlowy Mobile 2.0! We have completely redesigned the interface and added some powerful new features. HIGHLIGHTS Visual refresh gives the app a modern feel The blue button allows you to easily add new items to the top of the current list The Star menu lets you bookmark lists for easy access. There is also a small button next to each starred item which lets you quick add to any of your starred lists You can undo or redo changes using buttons under the ... menu. You can now swipe any item from left to right to mark it completed Edit controls have moved above the keyboard for improved one hand usage Home and Back buttons Fixed dozens of longstanding bugs
Fixed a display alignment bug when the app cannot connect to the internet and you aren t logged in yet.

Enabling Split Screen mode on iPad Fixing a few iOS 9 Bugs Changing the launch image to the logo. Bug details: There were a few iOS 9 Bugs related moving an item. Previously when you did a long tap to move an item a weird magnifying glass thingy would come up. Then when you finished moving the item some text would get selected and the text editing controls would come up in a random place. That wasn t cool and we didn t like it. So we fixed it.
Actually fixing scaling issue for iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 plus.
Updated to support iPhone 6 and iOS 8
We ve fixed a bug that sometimes delayed WorkFlowy s syncing of updates made on other devices to a point where people thought it wasn t working.
Fixing issue that prevented email links from working.
Minor changes in how text editing works.
Minor update for iOS 7.
Minor update. Fixes a small display issue while app is loading.
Offline support! You can now launch view and edit WorkFlowy without an internet connection.
Offline support! You can now use WorkFlowy without an internet connection.

NEW FEATURES You can move items. Just tap hold and drag. BUG FIXES Fixes the iOS 6 bug where autocapitalization doesn t work when hitting enter to create a new item Fixes the iOS 6 bug where hitting enter while editing sometimes adds new text into the item you are editing. Fixes a bug that could occasionally result in minor saving errors when one makes an edit and immediately closes the app. The startup background image on iPhone 5 is no longer stretched.
Updated for iPhone 5. Works in landscape mode on iPad.
